#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Resource Discovery Registry =
prefix dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

prefix registry: <http://bio2rdf.org/registry:>


==Namespace Entry==
{{{
 dc:identifier [string]             # given by source + short name [e.g. registry:bind]
 registry:namespace [unique string] # the official namespace identifier [e.g. bind]
 dcterms:title [string]             # a brief summary of the resource [e.g. The Biomolecular Interaction Network Database]
 dcterms:description [string]       # a more elaborate description 
 dcterms:subject [url|ns:id|string] # a curated subject heading [e.g. protein interaction]
 foaf:homepage [url]                # the homepage of the resource [e.g. http://bind.ca]
 :specification [regex]             # a regular expression to validate the identifier against
 :example [string]                  # an example identifier [e.g. 123]

 dcterms:replaces [string]          # if this supercedes another registry entry [e.g. nar:BIND]
 dcterms:isReplacedBy [string]      # if this is supercedes by another registry entry

 dc:publisher [Publisher Record]    # link to a publisher
 :available_as [Data Record]        # link to a data record
}}}

===Publisher Entry==
{{{ 
 :id [uri]
 foaf:name [string]
 foaf:homepage [url]
}}}

==Data Entry==
{{{
 :id [uri]
 dcterms:subject [Namespace Record]
 dcterms:format [tab|flatfile|n3|rdfxml|virtuosodb|...]
 :size [integer] # of bytes
 :location [url]
 dcterms:accessRights [url]
 dcterms:license [url]

 :sparql [url[:port]]
 :wsdl [url[:port]]

 dcterms:source [uri]
 dcterms:publisher [Publisher Record]
 :statistics [Statistics Record]
}}}

==Statistics Entry==
{{{
 :id [uri]
 :records [integer] entries in the core namespace
 :topics [integer]  total # of unique entities
 :triples [integer] total # of unique statements
}}} 
 



 
 
Example
{{{
<http://bio2rdf.org/ns:uniprot>
 rdf:type :namespace ;
 :namespace "uniprot" ;
 :title "UniProt protein database" ;
 :description "The UniProt/Swiss-Prot Protein Knowledgebase is a curated protein sequence database established in 1986. It provides a high level of annotation (such as the description of protein function, domains structure, post-translational modifications, variants, etc.), a minimal level of redundancy and high level of integration with other databases. It is part of the Universal Protein Knowledgebase (UniProt), a &quot;one-stop shop&quot; that allows easy access to all publicly available information of protein sequence annotation." ;
 :subject "protein" ;
 :id_example "Q16665" ;
 :organization_URL <http://uniprot.org> ;
 :availability "free" ;
 :replaces "uniprot/swissprot" ;
 :replaces "uniprotkb" ;
}}}


== Data Provision Registry ==
rdf:resource [uri]
 :ns [unique string]
 :isDescribedBy :Document
 

:Document
 :format [:HTML|:XML|:GFF|:FAA|:RDFXML|:RDFN3|:OWLXML| ..etc]
 :mimetype [string]
 :isProvidedBy [:DataProvider]


:DataProvider
 :title
 :description
 :email
 :url [:HTML]
